img_text: "They are not there any more. They are on TV and complaining all the time because they are not active in the club. If you want to work in the club, go and search for work in the club. So you cannot be on TV and always complaining and criticising. Yeah, okay, you've had your time, we know it." Zlatan Ibrahimovic on Man United's 'Class of '92' via Daily Mirror
